CustomField.description: If true, billable non-billable hours will show via hover text on each total in the totals row for all the daily columns and sum column on timecard in Time Entry.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true, billable non-billable hours will show via hover text on each total in the totals row for all the daily columns and sum column on timecard in Time Entry.
CustomField.label: Show Billable NonBillable Hours
